DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ,spr_prcss_stp_nm from spr_prcss_stp_mstr order by spr_prcss_stp_nm,spr_prcss_stp_sys_id
select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ,spr_prcss_stp_nm from spr_prcss_stp_mstr where prod_family ='PPO' order by spr_prcss_stp_nm

SelectSQLQuery.name: retrieveAdminMethodNumber
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select admn_mthd_no,admn_mthd_desc ,admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_mstr where 1=1 and spr_prcss_stp_sys_id < 15
order by admn_mthd_no,admn_mthd_desc,admn_mthd_sys_id asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select i.PRMRY_CD,i.CD_DESC_TXT from item i,catalog c where c.CTLG_ID = i.CTLG_ID and upper(c.CTLG_NAME) ='TERM' order by i.PRMRY_CD asc
select i.PRMRY_CD,i.CD_DESC_TXT from item i,catalog c where c.CTLG_ID = i.CTLG_ID and upper(c.CTLG_NAME) ='REFERENCETYPE' order by i.PRMRY_CD asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchQualifier
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select i.PRMRY_CD,i.CD_DESC_TXT from item i,catalog c where c.CTLG_ID = i.CTLG_ID and upper(c.CTLG_NAME) ='QUALIFIER'
order by i.PRMRY_CD asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: getValidComponentsForProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, D.BNFT_CMPNT_NM FROM PROD_MSTR A, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN B, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR D WHERE A.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = A.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID NOT IN (SELECT C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN C WHERE C.PROD_SYS_ID = {0}) AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID
ORDER BY D.BNFT_CMPNT_NM

SelectSQLQuery.name: benefitSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: AND BENEFITS_ST.BNFT_PARNT_ID NOT IN (SELECT A.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM BMST_BNFT_MSTR A,BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN B WHERE B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID= {0} AND (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_SYS_ID) ) ORDER BY BENEFITS_ST.BENEFIT_NM )) where rownum < 52

SelectSQLQuery.name: selectBenefitComponent
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR A ,(select BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, MAX(BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR) BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR X WHERE X.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' GROUP BY BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID) AA, PROD_STRCTR_MSTR F where A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = AA.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR = AA.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM NOT IN (SELECT a.BNFT_CMPNT_NM FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN e,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a WHERE e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND TRUNC(A.BNFT_CMPNT_EFCTV_DT) <= TRUNC(F.PROD_STRCTR_EFCTV_DT) AND TRUNC(A.BNFT_CMPNT_EXPIRY_DT) >= TRUNC(F.PROD_STRCTR_EXPIRY_DT) AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE= F.PROD_STRCTR_TYPE AND nvl(A.BNFT_CMPNT_MDNT_TYPE,'NULL') = nvl(F.PROD_STRCTR_MNDT_TYPE,'NULL') AND nvl(A.BNFT_CMPNT_ST_CD,'NULL') = nvl(F.PROD_STRCTR_ST_CD,'NULL') AND F.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}

AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM in(SELECT b.LOB_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB --, --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD )GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.LOB_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD in(SELECT b.LOB_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB --, --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD ) AND CTLG_ID = 1925)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.LOB_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM in(SELECT b.BUS_ENTY_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE --, --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) --and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD ) GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_ENTY_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD in(SELECT b.BUS_ENTY_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE --, --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) --and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD ) AND CTLG_ID = 1932)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM in(SELECT b.BUS_GRP_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) --and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD) GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_GRP_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD in(SELECT b.BUS_GRP_NM FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1925) LOB , --(SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1932) BE , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 1933) BG WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) --and b.LOB_NM=LOB.PRMRY_CD --and b.BUS_ENTY_NM =BE.PRMRY_CD and b.BUS_GRP_NM=BG.PRMRY_CD) AND CTLG_ID = 1933)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.BUS_GRP_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
and A.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID AND b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT in(SELECT b.MRKT_BUS_UNT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 3470) MBU WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) and b.MRKT_BUS_UNT =MBU.PRMRY_CD ) GROUP BY a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.MRKT_BUS_UNT) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD in(SELECT b.MRKT_BUS_UNT FROM ENTY_DOMN_INFO a, AVLBL_DOMN b , (SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CTLG_ID = 3470)MBU WHERE a.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID in (select PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR where PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {0}) and b.MRKT_BUS_UNT =MBU.PRMRY_CD ) AND CTLG_ID = 3470)) union (select unique a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'BENEFITCOMP' and c.MRKT_BUS_UNT LIKE 'ALL') )
order by A.BNFT_CMPNT_NM

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchSPSForMapping
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from ( select distinct b.prmry_cd, b.cd_desc_txt from sps_mapg A,Item B where b.prmry_cd =a.sps_id and b.ctlg_id =1938
order by b.prmry_cd asc ) A where rownum <= 51

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchSPSForMapping1
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from ( select distinct b.prmry_cd, b.cd_desc_txt from sps_mapg A,Item B where b.prmry_cd =a.sps_id and b.ctlg_id =1938
order by b.prmry_cd asc ) A

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminOption
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a WHERE a.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND a.TERM_CD is null AND a.QLFR_CD is null

AND a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT NOT IN (SELECT a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c WHERE c.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and c.DEL_FLAG = 'N' ) AND a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR IN (SELECT MAX(x.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR x WHERE x.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT = a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT AND x.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' GROUP BY x.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT ) ORDER BY a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminOptionListForBenefitLevel
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
select a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT from ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, (select a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT desctext, max(a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) max_ver from ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL b where a.TERM_CD IN (SELECT SUBSTR (blvl_bnft_lvl_term, 1, INSTR (blvl_bnft_lvl_term, ',', 1) - 1 ) FROM blvl_bnft_lvl WHERE blvl_bnft_lvl_id = {1} UNION SELECT SUBSTR (blvl_bnft_lvl_term, INSTR (blvl_bnft_lvl_term, ',', 1) + 1 ) FROM blvl_bnft_lvl WHERE blvl_bnft_lvl_id = {1}) and (a.QLFR_CD IN (SELECT SUBSTR (nvl(BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,'NULL'), 1, INSTR (nvl(BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,'NULL'), ',', 1) - 1 ) FROM blvl_bnft_lvl WHERE blvl_bnft_lvl_id = {1} UNION SELECT SUBSTR (nvl(BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,'NULL'), INSTR (nvl(BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR,'NULL'), ',', 1) + 1 ) FROM blvl_bnft_lvl WHERE blvl_bnft_lvl_id = {1}) or (a.QLFR_CD is null or a.QLFR_CD = '')) and b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = {1} and a.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' and a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT not in (select a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT from ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c where c.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and c.DEL_FLAG = 'N' )
group by a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT )alias where a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT = alias.desctext
and a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR = alias.max_ver order by upper(a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT)

SelectSQLQuery.name: getRuleId
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT rule_id, rule_shrt_desc FROM rule WHERE wpd_del_flag = 'N' AND rule_typ_cd = {0}
order by rule_id asc , rule_shrt_desc asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitName
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select distinct bnft_sys_id,BNFT_ID_NM from(select bnft_sys_id,BNFT_ID_NM from bmst_bnft_mstr where (bnft_id_nm,bnft_vrsn_nbr) in ( select BNFT_ID_NM,max(bnft_vrsn_nbr) from bmst_bnft_mstr group by BNFT_ID_NM)
order by BNFT_ID_NM asc)where rownum <= 51

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchIndicative
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select A.prmry_cd, A.cd_desc_txt,B.INDCTV_SGMNT from (select a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cd_desc_txt asc) AS rn from item a where a.ctlg_id = 4147
order by cd_desc_txt asc) A,INDCTV_DTL B where b.INDCTV_CD = a.PRMRY_CD and a.rn <52 order by cd_desc_txt asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchSPS
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from (select prmry_cd, cd_desc_txt from (select A.prmry_cd, A.cd_desc_txt from item A where A.ctlg_id=1938
order by A.prmry_cd asc)) where rownum <=51

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchSPSDetail
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from (select A.prmry_cd,A.scndry_cd,A.cd_desc_txt from item A where A.ctlg_id=1938
order by A.prmry_cd asc)where rownum <=51

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchContractId
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from (select cntrct_sys_id,cntrct_id from cmst_cntrct_mstr where (cntrct_id, cntrct_vrsn_nbr) in ( select cntrct_id,max(cntrct_vrsn_nbr) from cmst_cntrct_mstr where cntrct_stts_cd != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION' group by cntrct_id)
) where rownum <=51 order by cntrct_id asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT cds.dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM cntrct_dt_sgmnt cds, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn cdsa, cmst_cntrct_mstr ccm WHERE ccm.cntrct_sys_id = cdsa.cntrct_sys_id AND cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND ccm.cntrct_sys_id = {0} AND cds.dt_sgmnt_test_prod_ind = 'N' ORDER BY cds.dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt

SelectSQLQuery.name: retrieveAllLatestAdminOptons
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, adminOpt.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT from ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, (SELECT b.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, max(b.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) maxver FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR b WHERE ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT NOT IN ( SELECT d.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT FROM ENTY_ADMN_OPT_ASSN c,ADMIN_OPT_MSTR d where d.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = c.ADMN_OPT_SYS_ID and c.ENTY_SYS_ID= {0} AND c.ENTY_TYPE = 'PRODUCT') and b.TERM_CD is null and b.QLFR_CD is null GROUP BY b.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT ORDER BY ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) adminOpt where adminOpt.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT = a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT and adminOpt.maxver = a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR and a.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED'
ORDER BY UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT)

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminOptionForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT a.admin_opt_sys_id, a.admin_opt_desc_txt FROM admin_opt_mstr a WHERE admin_opt_sys_id IN (SELECT admn_opt_sys_id FROM enty_admn_opt_assn WHERE enty_sys_id in(select PROD_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT where dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}) AND enty_type = 'PRODUCT') AND admin_opt_sys_id NOT IN (SELECT admn_opt_sys_id FROM enty_admn_opt_assn WHERE enty_sys_id = {0} -- datesegment id AND enty_type = 'CONTRACT')
GROUP BY admin_opt_sys_id, admin_opt_desc_txt ORDER BY admin_opt_desc_txt

SelectSQLQuery.name: contractRuleTypeSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT A.RULE_ID, A.RULE_PVA, A.GNRTD_RULE_ID,B.RULE_SHRT_DESC,A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN A,RULE B WHERE PROD_SYS_ID IN (Select PROD_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT where DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0}) AND B.RULE_ID = A.RULE_ID AND upper(A.GNRTD_RULE_ID) LIKE upper({1}) AND A.GNRTD_RULE_ID NOT IN (SELECT GNRTD_RULE_ID FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_RULE_SYS_ID IN( SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} ))
ORDER BY A.GNRTD_RULE_ID asc,B.RULE_SHRT_DESC asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateRuleId
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT rule_id, rule_shrt_desc,rule_typ_cd FROM rule WHERE rule_typ_cd in ('WPDAUTOBG','BLZWPDAB') AND wpd_del_flag = 'N'
ORDER BY rule_id,rule_shrt_desc asc
